content.description: start sitting left hand crimp right hand in hueco   crux is the start
content.location: on the boulder next to ministry of truth

content.description: awkward hard start, starts left hand in a hueco right on a crimp to fun easy climbing.
content.protection: pads spotter, kind of sketchy top
content.location: looking at ministry of truth it is to the right and around the corner

content.description: Start on big underclings under the roof. Reach to a glassy rail, then move right and up to the top.

Pretty pure power problem and not too tweaky. 

  From a high two hand edge campus up to another edge. Then figure out how to get to the crack above, there are a couple of different ways to do it. The crack above is easy and you will have the edges as feet to start.
content.location: As you approach the Sausage Factory you will go under the right side of a large round boulder. Once inside the Sausage Factory room turn around and find the problem on the right side of this boulder.

content.description:
This route begins on a jug under the roof that is on your left as you enter the center of the Sausage Factory.  Climbs out tension slopers and jugs to a big move to a gaston and a bump that will get you to the lip. 

  3 stars for cool holds, movement, and obvious line. -1 for the leg breaking boulder to your left as you do the committing moves to the lip.
content.protection: 2 pads.  Spotter at the end so you don't great you're leg.
content.location: This route is on the tier down from Ministry of Truth and is by itself inside a small cave on your left as you enter the Sausage Factory proper.

content.description: fun, starts on low right hand jug left hand crimp and traverses right along sloper rail
content.location: to the left of long haul

content.description: Same start at Smokin' Sausage, go directly up via crimps.
This area offers shaded climbs and is home to good, but hard moderates such as The Long Haul (V8), Ministry of Truth (V9), Glass Ass Crack (V9) and the test piece of the area Plastique (V12).
